channel.title: Animation only sets with ancient staff?

item.title: Animation only sets with ancient staff?
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

For some reason, my startAnimation(); only works when I have an ancient staff. I canâ€™t get it to work elsewhere. Everything else works fine.

if(itemUsed == 946 && useWith == 1511 || itemUsed == 1511 && useWith == 946) { startAnimation(1248); deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1); addItem(50, 1); sendMessage("You carve a shortbow out of the logs."); addSkillXP(35, 9); }

It does this for all my unstrung bows.

Read full topic
item.source: Animation only sets with ancient staff?
